column2: ENGLISH
Raise Black Knight from death
My good standing with the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s allows me to request that they riase a powerful warrior from death to serve me for several years
Awaken undead army
if I'm to win this war I must ask the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s to give me an army of the undead, my land has plenty of undisturbed bodies that can be used for this purpose
Charm target
Cast a confusing charm that will improve the targets relation with you
Welcome brother
I grow in power
Departed for the eastern lands
It's time for me to leave this western land and small inhabitants
A hulking man clad from head to toe in steel armor was brought before me today, he claims to come from Eastern lands beyond the mana wastes
That's impossible, isn't it?
If nothing else he'll make a good warrior
I'm now vulnerable to being corrupted by my faith in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
My prayers have been answered, I now hear quiet whispers from [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] inside my mind as I rest
If I focus I can hear them in the day too
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been teaching me, and now I feel different, my mind is warping into a reflection of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s will
Give me your wisdom O' Unending Hunger!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been teaching me, and now I feel different, my mind is warping into a reflection of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s will
My mind is yours

I'm your servent, not your slave
